publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-849.1.1 Roseanna Cunningham: Non-Compliance with Minimum Wage Legislationâ€”As an amendment to amendment (S3M-849.1) in the name of Sarah Boyack, leave out from "regrets" to end and insert "notes that in the final substantive vote in the House of Commons at third reading in March 1998, not only did the then Prime Minister not vote, but 35 Scottish Labour MPs were also absent, including the current Prime Minister, the first two First Ministers of the Scottish Executive and the current Chancellor of the Exchequer."
S3M-849.1.1 Non-Compliance with Minimum Wage Legislation (lodged on 16 November 2007) Jamie Hepburn*
